{{TranscriptBlock

}}

{{TranscriptBlock
    | name      = Unknown Speaker

}}

{{TranscriptBlock

    | name      = Unknown Speaker

}}

{{TranscriptBlock
    | name      = Unknown Speaker
    | timestamp = 00:06:10.000
    | text      = Yeah, absolutely.
}}

{{TranscriptBlock
    | name      = Unknown Speaker
    | timestamp = 00:06:10.879
    | text      = So Jordan, here's the situation that I find myself in.
}}

{{TranscriptBlock
    | name      = Unknown Speaker
    | timestamp = 00:06:13.560
    | text      = What's that?
}}

{{TranscriptBlock
    | name      = Unknown Speaker
    | timestamp = 00:06:14.680
    | text      = So for our second episode this week,
}}

{{TranscriptBlock
    | name      = Unknown Speaker
    | timestamp = 00:06:16.519
    | text      = I felt a desire to get back in and discuss Alex's return
}}

{{TranscriptBlock
    | name      = Unknown Speaker
    | timestamp = 00:06:19.560
    | text      = to the studio after his trip to CPAC.
}}

{{TranscriptBlock
    | name      = Unknown Speaker
    | timestamp = 00:06:22.319
    | text      = I knew he had some hot takes about the coronavirus.
}}

{{TranscriptBlock
    | name      = Unknown Speaker
    | timestamp = 00:06:24.920
    | text      = Apparently, he's trying to lure Sebastian Gorka
}}

{{TranscriptBlock
    | name      = Unknown Speaker
    | timestamp = 00:06:27.519
    | text      = into a sad publicity stunt fight.
}}

{{TranscriptBlock
    | name      = Unknown Speaker
    | timestamp = 00:06:29.839
    | text      = And he's getting more and more comfortable these days
}}

{{TranscriptBlock
    | name      = Unknown Speaker
    | timestamp = 00:06:31.879
    | text      = bragging about literally murdering people,
}}

{{TranscriptBlock
    | name      = Unknown Speaker
    | timestamp = 00:06:33.800
    | text      = as I've seen reported around.
}}

{{TranscriptBlock
    | name      = Unknown Speaker
    | timestamp = 00:06:36.680
    | text      = He's up to that again.
}}

{{TranscriptBlock
    | name      = Unknown Speaker
    | timestamp = 00:06:37.519
    | text      = Yep, yep.
}}

{{TranscriptBlock
    | name      = Unknown Speaker
    | timestamp = 00:06:38.360
    | text      = Cool.
}}

{{TranscriptBlock
    | name      = Unknown Speaker
    | timestamp = 00:06:39.199
    | text      = There he is.
}}

{{TranscriptBlock
    | name      = Unknown Speaker
    | timestamp = 00:06:40.040
    | text      = I wish that those headlines would say, again.
}}

{{TranscriptBlock
    | name      = Unknown Speaker
    | timestamp = 00:06:41.839
    | text      = But everyone learns anew at some point, and that's great.
}}

{{TranscriptBlock
    | name      = Unknown Speaker
    | timestamp = 00:06:46.839
    | text      = Hey, as long as everybody's getting there.
}}

{{TranscriptBlock
    | name      = Unknown Speaker
    | timestamp = 00:06:49.000
    | text      = Sure.
}}

{{TranscriptBlock
    | name      = Unknown Speaker
    | timestamp = 00:06:49.639
    | text      = If you get there, you get there.
}}

{{TranscriptBlock
    | name      = Unknown Speaker
    | timestamp = 00:06:50.720
    | text      = Alex Jones brags a lot about murder.
}}

{{TranscriptBlock
    | name      = Unknown Speaker
    | timestamp = 00:06:52.160
    | text      = He does it a lot.
}}

{{TranscriptBlock
    | name      = Unknown Speaker
    | timestamp = 00:06:53.160
    | text      = So Monday's show was four hours long
}}

{{TranscriptBlock
    | name      = Unknown Speaker
    | timestamp = 00:06:55.319
    | text      = and full of emotional trouble,
}}

{{TranscriptBlock
    | name      = Unknown Speaker
    | timestamp = 00:06:56.639
    | text      = and also just awful right-wing content.
}}

{{TranscriptBlock
    | name      = Unknown Speaker
    | timestamp = 00:06:59.040
    | text      = The prospect of this Friday episode
}}

{{TranscriptBlock
    | name      = Unknown Speaker
    | timestamp = 00:07:00.680
    | text      = being another long, dense affair
}}

{{TranscriptBlock
    | name      = Unknown Speaker
    | timestamp = 00:07:02.279
    | text      = just didn't seem like it would be right
}}

{{TranscriptBlock
    | name      = Unknown Speaker
    | timestamp = 00:07:04.040
    | text      = in terms of being a steward of our audience's well-being.
}}

{{TranscriptBlock
    | name      = Unknown Speaker
    | timestamp = 00:07:07.279
    | text      = I did not feel comfortable with that.
}}

{{TranscriptBlock
    | name      = Unknown Speaker
    | timestamp = 00:07:09.279
    | text      = And so what I decided to do was cover this past week's
}}

{{TranscriptBlock
    | name      = Unknown Speaker
    | timestamp = 00:07:12.600
    | text      = content of Alex's show on our episode for Monday.
}}

{{TranscriptBlock
    | name      = Unknown Speaker
    | timestamp = 00:07:15.360
    | text      = So on Monday, we'll be going over this past week
}}

{{TranscriptBlock
    | name      = Unknown Speaker
    | timestamp = 00:07:18.360
    | text      = and the chaos that's ensued on Alex's show.
}}

{{TranscriptBlock
    | name      = Unknown Speaker
    | timestamp = 00:07:21.199
    | text      = And today, I thought we could spend a little time
}}

{{TranscriptBlock
    | name      = Unknown Speaker
    | timestamp = 00:07:23.319
    | text      = doing something a little more fun and fancy-free.
}}

{{TranscriptBlock
    | name      = Unknown Speaker
    | timestamp = 00:07:25.759
    | text      = The tensions are high in the world,
}}

{{TranscriptBlock
    | name      = Unknown Speaker
    | timestamp = 00:07:27.240
    | text      = what with the growing public health situation,
}}

{{TranscriptBlock
    | name      = Unknown Speaker
    | timestamp = 00:07:29.040
    | text      = the Democratic primary,
}}

{{TranscriptBlock
    | name      = Unknown Speaker
    | timestamp = 00:07:30.439
    | text      = and countless other real-world stressors.
}}

{{TranscriptBlock
    | name      = Unknown Speaker
    | timestamp = 00:07:32.600
    | text      = So it seemed clear to me that if we're gonna survive,
}}

{{TranscriptBlock
    | name      = Unknown Speaker
    | timestamp = 00:07:35.240
    | text      = we need something as removed
}}

{{TranscriptBlock
    | name      = Unknown Speaker
    | timestamp = 00:07:36.720
    | text      = from real-world stressors as possible.
}}

{{TranscriptBlock
    | name      = Unknown Speaker
    | timestamp = 00:07:39.279
    | text      = And just our luck.
}}

{{TranscriptBlock
    | name      = Unknown Speaker
    | timestamp = 00:07:40.560
    | text      = At the end of last week,
}}

{{TranscriptBlock
    | name      = Unknown Speaker
    | timestamp = 00:07:42.040
    | text      = Carrie Cassidy over at Project Camelot
}}

{{TranscriptBlock
    | name      = Unknown Speaker
    | timestamp = 00:07:44.319
    | text      = released her 12th interview.
}}

{{TranscriptBlock
    | name      = Unknown Speaker
    | timestamp = 00:07:45.800
    | text      = Do not tell me it's the 12th interview.
}}

{{TranscriptBlock
    | name      = Unknown Speaker
    | timestamp = 00:07:47.959
    | text      = With murderer slash space hero, Mark Richards.
}}

{{TranscriptBlock
    | name      = Unknown Speaker
    | timestamp = 00:07:51.360
    | text      = Yay!
}}

{{TranscriptBlock
    | name      = Unknown Speaker
    | timestamp = 00:07:52.199
    | text      = And that means that even if we weren't
}}

{{TranscriptBlock
    | name      = Unknown Speaker
    | timestamp = 00:07:53.800
    | text      = in this sort of position
}}

{{TranscriptBlock
    | name      = Unknown Speaker
    | timestamp = 00:07:54.720
    | text      = where the tensions are really high,
}}

{{TranscriptBlock
    | name      = Unknown Speaker
    | timestamp = 00:07:55.879
    | text      = we would still need to drop everything.
}}

{{TranscriptBlock
    | name      = Unknown Speaker
    | timestamp = 00:07:57.360
    | text      = Absolutely. And cover this interview.
}}

{{TranscriptBlock
    | name      = Unknown Speaker
    | timestamp = 00:07:58.519
    | text      = Yeah, yeah, yeah.
}}

{{TranscriptBlock
    | name      = Unknown Speaker
    | timestamp = 00:07:59.399
    | text      = To get everyone up to speed
}}

{{TranscriptBlock
    | name      = Unknown Speaker
    | timestamp = 00:08:00.519
    | text      = who haven't heard all of our old episodes about this,
}}

{{TranscriptBlock
    | name      = Unknown Speaker
    | timestamp = 00:08:03.120
    | text      = Mark Richards has been in prison since the 80s,
}}

{{TranscriptBlock
    | name      = Unknown Speaker
    | timestamp = 00:08:05.040
    | text      = having been convicted of orchestrating
}}

{{TranscriptBlock
    | name      = Unknown Speaker
    | timestamp = 00:08:06.879
    | text      = the murder of an associate of his.
}}

{{TranscriptBlock
    | name      = Unknown Speaker
    | timestamp = 00:08:08.759
    | text      = It's very complicated to get into briefly,
}}

{{TranscriptBlock
    | name      = Unknown Speaker
    | timestamp = 00:08:10.680
    | text      = but we've been over it a bunch
}}

{{TranscriptBlock
    | name      = Unknown Speaker
    | timestamp = 00:08:11.759
    | text      = and Mark totally did that shit.
}}

{{TranscriptBlock
    | name      = Unknown Speaker
    | timestamp = 00:08:13.800
    | text      = Mark was also a little bit of a cult leader
}}

{{TranscriptBlock
    | name      = Unknown Speaker
    | timestamp = 00:08:15.800
    | text      = and he'd enlisted young men in his work crew
}}

{{TranscriptBlock
    | name      = Unknown Speaker
    | timestamp = 00:08:18.040
    | text      = to be knights of his new Camelot,
}}

{{TranscriptBlock
    | name      = Unknown Speaker
    | timestamp = 00:08:19.720
    | text      = which would come into its ultimate form
}}

{{TranscriptBlock
    | name      = Unknown Speaker
    | timestamp = 00:08:21.720
    | text      = when they used a laser to isolate Marine County
}}

{{TranscriptBlock
    | name      = Unknown Speaker
    | timestamp = 00:08:24.279
    | text      = from the rest of the United States,
}}

{{TranscriptBlock
    | name      = Unknown Speaker
    | timestamp = 00:08:25.560
    | text      = at which point it would become Mark's kingdom.
}}

{{TranscriptBlock
    | name      = Unknown Speaker
    | timestamp = 00:08:27.279
    | text      = Yes, they were surprisingly close to making that a reality.
}}

{{TranscriptBlock
    | name      = Unknown Speaker
    | timestamp = 00:08:30.879
    | text      = I don't know if they were.
}}

{{TranscriptBlock
    | name      = Unknown Speaker
    | timestamp = 00:08:32.200
    | text      = Since going to prison,
}}

{{TranscriptBlock
    | name      = Unknown Speaker
    | timestamp = 00:08:33.200
    | text      = Mark has married a woman named Joanne,
}}

{{TranscriptBlock
    | name      = Unknown Speaker
    | timestamp = 00:08:34.960
    | text      = who runs the Earth Defense Headquarters.
}}

{{TranscriptBlock
    | name      = Unknown Speaker
    | timestamp = 00:08:37.639
    | text      = I'm unclear on exactly what they do,
}}

{{TranscriptBlock
    | name      = Unknown Speaker
    | timestamp = 00:08:39.720
    | text      = other than sell Mark's writing
}}

{{TranscriptBlock
    | name      = Unknown Speaker
    | timestamp = 00:08:41.200
    | text      = and they book Joanne to speak at space weirdo conferences.
}}

{{TranscriptBlock
    | name      = Unknown Speaker
    | timestamp = 00:08:46.120
    | text      = Through Joanne,
}}

{{TranscriptBlock
    | name      = Unknown Speaker
    | timestamp = 00:08:47.039
    | text      = Mark has created an overly elaborate backstory
}}

{{TranscriptBlock
    | name      = Unknown Speaker
    | timestamp = 00:08:49.679
    | text      = aimed at building an absurdly heroic mythos for himself,
}}

{{TranscriptBlock
    | name      = Unknown Speaker
    | timestamp = 00:08:53.039
    | text      = as well as proving that he's innocent of the crime
}}

{{TranscriptBlock
    | name      = Unknown Speaker
    | timestamp = 00:08:55.840
    | text      = he's in jail for definitely committing.
}}

{{TranscriptBlock
    | name      = Unknown Speaker
    | timestamp = 00:08:57.639
    | text      = He is not innocent.
}}

{{TranscriptBlock
    | name      = Unknown Speaker
    | timestamp = 00:08:58.639
    | text      = As it turns out,
}}

{{TranscriptBlock
    | name      = Unknown Speaker
    | timestamp = 00:08:59.480
    | text      = he couldn't have been involved in the murder
}}

{{TranscriptBlock
    | name      = Unknown Speaker
    | timestamp = 00:09:01.000
    | text      = because he was off planet doing space mission at the time,
}}

{{TranscriptBlock
    | name      = Unknown Speaker
    | timestamp = 00:09:03.960
    | text      = case closed, dude is innocent.
}}

{{TranscriptBlock
    | name      = Unknown Speaker
    | timestamp = 00:09:05.600
    | text      = It does sound like he couldn't have done it.
}}

{{TranscriptBlock
    | name      = Unknown Speaker
    | timestamp = 00:09:08.360
    | text      = At some point, Joanne met Carrie Cassidy,
}}

{{TranscriptBlock
    | name      = Unknown Speaker
    | timestamp = 00:09:10.879
    | text      = who runs a YouTube channel
}}

{{TranscriptBlock
    | name      = Unknown Speaker
    | timestamp = 00:09:12.320
    | text      = where people lie to her about space adventures.
}}

{{TranscriptBlock
    | name      = Unknown Speaker
    | timestamp = 00:09:15.000
    | text      = Carrie interviewed Joanne about Mark's heroics
}}

{{TranscriptBlock
    | name      = Unknown Speaker
    | timestamp = 00:09:17.240
    | text      = and through this,
}}

{{TranscriptBlock
    | name      = Unknown Speaker
    | timestamp = 00:09:18.080
    | text      = Carrie ended up being welcomed to interview Mark in prison
}}

{{TranscriptBlock
    | name      = Unknown Speaker
    | timestamp = 00:09:20.759
    | text      = at Vacaville in person.
}}

{{TranscriptBlock
    | name      = Unknown Speaker
    | timestamp = 00:09:23.159
    | text      = From there, the rest is history.
}}

{{TranscriptBlock
    | name      = Unknown Speaker
    | timestamp = 00:09:25.480
    | text      = Carrie has interviewed Mark 12 times now
}}

{{TranscriptBlock
    | name      = Unknown Speaker
    | timestamp = 00:09:27.360
    | text      = and the stories he tells her
}}

{{TranscriptBlock
    | name      = Unknown Speaker
    | timestamp = 00:09:28.360
    | text      = range from standard conspiracy shit
}}

{{TranscriptBlock
    | name      = Unknown Speaker
    | timestamp = 00:09:30.240
    | text      = to the most outrageously fun nonsense I've ever heard.
}}

{{TranscriptBlock
    | name      = Unknown Speaker
    | timestamp = 00:09:34.799
    | text      = His sentient spacecraft Minerva
}}

{{TranscriptBlock
    | name      = Unknown Speaker
    | timestamp = 00:09:36.679
    | text      = has a delightful personality,
}}

{{TranscriptBlock
    | name      = Unknown Speaker
    | timestamp = 00:09:38.399
    | text      = but will not fly with anyone but Mark because of loyalties.
}}

{{TranscriptBlock
    | name      = Unknown Speaker
    | timestamp = 00:09:42.480
    | text      = Speaking of loyalties,
}}

{{TranscriptBlock
    | name      = Unknown Speaker
    | timestamp = 00:09:43.639
    | text      = the noble raptor aliens are viciously loyal
}}

{{TranscriptBlock
    | name      = Unknown Speaker
    | timestamp = 00:09:45.960
    | text      = to Mark personally to the point
}}

{{TranscriptBlock
    | name      = Unknown Speaker
    | timestamp = 00:09:47.559
    | text      = where he once had an affair with their princess,
}}

{{TranscriptBlock
    | name      = Unknown Speaker
    | timestamp = 00:09:49.600
    | text      = the raptor princess.
}}

{{TranscriptBlock
    | name      = Unknown Speaker
    | timestamp = 00:09:50.600
    | text      = That is true.
}}

{{TranscriptBlock
    | name      = Unknown Speaker
    | timestamp = 00:09:51.440
    | text      = He knew JFK as a child.
}}

{{TranscriptBlock
    | name      = Unknown Speaker
    | timestamp = 00:09:53.360
    | text      = He's met aliens ranging from the mercantile dogs
}}

{{TranscriptBlock
    | name      = Unknown Speaker
    | timestamp = 00:09:56.320
    | text      = to the spider leadership to the archeologist cats.
}}

{{TranscriptBlock
    | name      = Unknown Speaker
    | timestamp = 00:09:59.320
    | text      = Didn't you know Winston Churchill too?
}}

{{TranscriptBlock
    | name      = Unknown Speaker
    | timestamp = 00:10:01.320
    | text      = Or no, the Dutchman knew Winston Churchill.
}}

{{TranscriptBlock
    | name      = Unknown Speaker
    | timestamp = 00:10:02.960
    | text      = The Dutchman.
}}

{{TranscriptBlock
    | name      = Unknown Speaker
    | timestamp = 00:10:03.799
    | text      = His dad, Alice, the Dutchman.
}}

{{TranscriptBlock
    | name      = Unknown Speaker
    | timestamp = 00:10:04.639
    | text      = His dad is the Dutchman, yes.
}}

{{TranscriptBlock
    | name      = Unknown Speaker
    | timestamp = 00:10:08.639
    | text      = Sad story.
}}

{{TranscriptBlock
    | name      = Unknown Speaker
    | timestamp = 00:10:09.679
    | text      = I can't even remember half the dumb shit he said
}}

{{TranscriptBlock
    | name      = Unknown Speaker
    | timestamp = 00:10:12.039
    | text      = that we've covered on this show,
}}

{{TranscriptBlock
    | name      = Unknown Speaker
    | timestamp = 00:10:13.080
    | text      = but most of it's really funny,
}}

{{TranscriptBlock
    | name      = Unknown Speaker
    | timestamp = 00:10:14.519
    | text      = like how raptor aliens were featured in Jurassic Park
}}

{{TranscriptBlock
    | name      = Unknown Speaker
    | timestamp = 00:10:17.159
    | text      = and the Walking with Dinosaurs show
}}

{{TranscriptBlock
    | name      = Unknown Speaker
    | timestamp = 00:10:19.000
    | text      = and how raptors like to come to earth to go antiquing.
}}

{{TranscriptBlock
    | name      = Unknown Speaker
    | timestamp = 00:10:21.639
    | text      = Yeah, they do.
}}

{{TranscriptBlock
    | name      = Unknown Speaker
    | timestamp = 00:10:22.480
    | text      = It's amazing nonsense.
}}

{{TranscriptBlock
    | name      = Unknown Speaker
    | timestamp = 00:10:24.399
    | text      = Also, there's a 50-50 chance he's aware of us.
}}

{{TranscriptBlock
    | name      = Unknown Speaker
    | timestamp = 00:10:27.799
    | text      = Listeners have pointed out that in an early
}}

{{TranscriptBlock
    | name      = Unknown Speaker
    | timestamp = 00:10:29.799
    | text      = Mark Richards episode, we joked about how,
}}

{{TranscriptBlock
    | name      = Unknown Speaker
    | timestamp = 00:10:31.960
    | text      = if he's listening, the way to subtly signal to us
}}

{{TranscriptBlock
    | name      = Unknown Speaker
    | timestamp = 00:10:34.879
    | text      = was to tell Carrie about squid or octopus aliens,
}}

{{TranscriptBlock
    | name      = Unknown Speaker
    | timestamp = 00:10:38.679
    | text      = which he did do in the 11th interview.
}}

{{TranscriptBlock
    | name      = Unknown Speaker
    | timestamp = 00:10:42.399
    | text      = Maybe the 10th, one of the more recent ones,
}}

{{TranscriptBlock
    | name      = Unknown Speaker
    | timestamp = 00:10:44.399
    | text      = he did bring up octopus aliens.
